results.content: This is a very good course for a beginner learning JMeter. It is structured well, and I was able to follow along with the steps that the instructor showed in the videos. Even though he does have an accent, it is not distracting, and I could understand his explanations clearly. I'd like to see the course expanded, as well, since there were many features of JMeter that were not tackled in the course.

results.content: The accent of somewhat hard to listen, although the teacher makes a good effort.
